Report financial statements, including the income statement, balance sheet, and statement of cash flows. Report audit findings Reporting audit findings to management. Practice an internal audit with criteria for confirming a problem, a description of the situation, and the root cause of the problem. Make recommendations that resolve the issue.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage legal and ethical issues
sub_work_functions.description: Managing legal practices to abide by the law, as well as ethical practices.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Create ethics policies
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creating a code of ethics that communicate the organization's philosophy to employees, vendors, customers, clients, and the public.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage corporate governance policies
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Administering the system of rules, practices, and processes through which a company is directed and controlled. Balance stakeholder interests including shareholders, management, customers, suppliers, financiers, government, and the community. Outline a strategy for achieving organizational goals, from action plans and internal controls to performance measurement and corporate disclosure.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Develop and perform preventive law programs
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creating and applying programs and activities. Encourage the adherence preventive laws, such as environmental law, sex discrimination, computer law, estate planning, corporate compliance, business planning, and property transactions.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Ensure compliance
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Ensuring the organization's compliance position. Validate compliance with different statutes, regulatory directions, and legal principles (using Establish compliance framework and policies [17468]). Coordinate with compliance and risk management personnel.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage outside counsel
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Managing professionals, sought externally for assistance over legal and ethical concerns. Administer and oversee assistance from subject matter experts and professionals for sourcing expert opinion and counseling over legal and ethical matters.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Protect intellectual property
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Safeguarding the intellectual property of the organization. This process requires the organization to protect a wide variety of intellectual property created by it. It involves creating and managing non-disclosure agreements (NDAs), following up on current developments in the areas where the organization holds patents, tracking the use of the organization's copyrighted material, creating and upholding licensing terms, and administering policies for safeguarding intellectual property.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Resolve disputes and litigations
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Resolving disputes or civil lawsuits internally or externally.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Provide legal advice/counseling
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Providing legal advice concerning the substance or procedure of a law in relation to a particular situation.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Negotiate and document agreements/contracts
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Negotiating terms to reach a final draft of a contract that is acceptable to all parties.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage public relations program
sub_work_functions.description: Managing a public relations programs through business and communications skills.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage community relations
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Developing and administering community relations. Establish business connections with the people constituting the environment the organization operates in and draws resources from in order to foster mutual understanding, trust, and support. Create programs that promote the organization's image in a positive and community-oriented way.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage media relations
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Developing and managing relations with media. Develop connections with journalists to solicit critical, third-party endorsements for a product, issue, service, or organization.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Promote political stability
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Promoting political security and stability in the regions where the organization conducts business. Encourage political stability in the regions where the organization operates. Support civic programs, citizen engagement, connection platforms, etc.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Create press releases
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Developing press releases to communicate developments and generate interest in the organization.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Issue press releases
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Issuing press releases to carefully selected media in distribution channels such as the web, newspapers, and social media.

work_functions.name: Develop and Manage Business Capabilities
work_functions.description: Performing activities by an organization that are fundamental to the successful operation of the organization, even across functions in a business. Capabilities defined in the PCF include business process management; portfolio, program, and project management; quality management; change management; benchmarking; environmental health and safety management; and knowledge management.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage business processes
sub_work_functions.description: Establishing and administering governance for management of the processes. Outline and manage the frameworks for management of the processes. Define the business processes. Administer the performance of the processes. Enhance the business processes.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Establish and maintain process management governance
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Defining and managing the organization's approach to governing business process management. Establish and manage tools to support the governance process. Assign ownership for all business processes. Perform activities to administer the governing process.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Define and manage process frameworks
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Determining and organizing the structural composition of business processes. Design, establish, and administer the framework. Identify any cross-functional processes that are mandatory for achieving business excellence.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Define processes
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Outlining and establishing the business processes of the organization. Scope, analyze, map, and publish processes for the employees who may require it.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage process performance
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Evaluating and handling the performance of business processes. Provide training to process owners. Support the execution of business processes. Measure and report the performance of the business processes.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Improve processes
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Identifying, selecting, and managing improvements. Based on the type and scope of the improvement, determination of the appropriate improvement methodology (e.g., Lean, Six Sigma, etc.) should guide the effort. This includes continuous improvement, process redesign, process reengineering, and application of the organizations approaches for Manage projects.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage portfolio, program, and project
sub_work_functions.description: Managing investments, holdings, products, businesses, and brands, along with the related projects that together constitute a program.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage portfolio
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Managing the business portfolio of the organization, including investments, holdings, products, businesses, and brands. Establish a portfolio strategy. Define portfolio governance. Monitor and control the portfolio.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage programs
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Establishing, implementing, and managing business programs. Successfully handle related projects that together constitute a program. Establish the program structure and approach. Coordinate with stakeholders and partners. Execute the program. Assess and report the performance of the program. Coordinate and prioritize resources across projects. Manage links between the projects and the overall costs and risks of the program.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage projects
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Establishing the scope of the projects. Create plans for implementing the projects. Initiate projects. Review and report project performance to management. Close projects.

sub_work_functions.search_text: Manage portfolio, program, and project Managing investments, holdings, products, businesses, and brands, along with the related projects that together constitute a program. sub_work_functions.name: Manage enterprise quality
sub_work_functions.description: Managing organizational attributes that are closely associated with the quality of output. Determine the quality requirements. Evaluate the correspondence between the quality performance and requirements. Manage non-conformance activities. Ensure implementation and maintenance of the enterprise quality management system.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Establish quality requirements
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Determining essential activities, processes, and attributes for securing enterprise quality. Outline critical characteristics for quality. Outline activities encouraging the preservation of quality. Create quality controls. Confirm capabilities in accordance with quality requirements. Finalize the plan for quality maintenance.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Evaluate performance to requirements
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Analyzing if the performance of the quality plan has achieved the estimated and desired requirements. Conduct tests against the quality plan. Assess the results of these tests.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage non-conformance
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Handling any nonconformance activities or events. Assess the potential impact of the nonconformity. Decide the immediate actions to take. Identify the root causes. Take corrective or preventive action. Ensure future conformance.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Implement and maintain the enterprise quality management system (EQMS)
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Establishing and administering the software that manages content and business processes for quality and compliance across the value chain. Define the quality strategy. Plan and deploy the EQMS scope, targets, and goals. Identify core process controls and metric. Develop EQMS governance. Assess the performance of EQMS. Encourage improvements in EQMS.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage change
sub_work_functions.description: Planning, designing, and implementing the change. Ensure improvement in the change process.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Plan for change
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Evaluating impact and planning change activities. Spanning the lifecycle of change from initial concept, to designing, implementing, and sustaining the change, change planning identifies the activities to enage and enable the stakeholders and all impacted by the change. Change plans should address the interplay between people, process, technology, and knowledge to guide the transition, or tranformation, from current state to the future state.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Design the change
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Developing plans for change management, training, communication, and rewards/incentives. Establish metrics for measuring the change adoption. Clarify new roles for employees. Identify budgets.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Implement change
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Effectuating the change within the desired impact areas of the organization. Ensure adequate commitment from all corners of the organization for the desired change. Create support structures. Refashion all processes deemed necessary. Observe the progress.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Sustain improvement
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Sustaining the impact of the change process in order to enact continual process improvement. Monitor the performance of re-engineered business processes. Identify best practices and potential issues. Effectuate remedial steps.

sub_work_functions.name: Develop and manage enterprise-wide knowledge management (KM) capability
sub_work_functions.description: Creating and administering the capability of the organization's knowledge management function. Develop a strategy for knowledge management. Assess capabilities of the knowledge management function.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Develop KM strategy
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creating a plan for managing the organization's knowledge base. Determine what kind of specialized knowledge the organization possesses, which elements of this collective knowledge can prove beneficial, how to capture and maintain this knowledge, how to grant access to this library of information, and how the organization should proceed.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Assess KM capabilities
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Assessing the maturity of the existing initiatives in knowledge management, and evaluating existing KM approaches. Identify the gaps and needs in order to enhance the existing KM approaches. Develop and implement new KM approaches.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Design and implement KM capabilities
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creating knowledge bases and other repositories to preserve and develop company expertise, and to train new employees.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Evolve and sustain KM capabilities
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Developing resources for improved knowledge management and knowledge engineering.

sub_work_functions.name: Measure and benchmark
sub_work_functions.description: Defining and managing measurement and benchmarking. Measure and benchmark the performance of internal processes, as well as the organization as a whole.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Define and manage organizational performance strategy
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creating and implementing a strategy for managing organizational performance. The strategy should include approaches for measuring, tracking, streamlining, and improving internal performance. It encompasses a blueprint for the tactical measurement of internal processes and work force improvement, in alignment with Employee Metrics Developed and Managed [10526].

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Benchmark performance
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Comparing organizational performance internally or externally with other organizations.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Evaluate performance
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Assessing process data, measures, and trends in an effort to evaluate process performance and identify possible improvements.

sub_work_functions.name: Develop, manage, and deliver analytics
sub_work_functions.description: Creating new and improving existing analytical capabilities to enhance data management pipeline.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Identify needs from stakeholders
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Gathering information from stakeholders prior to conducting analytics.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Scope analytics project
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Determining the size and scale of the project based upon the collected information and analytics.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Develop and manage hypotheses
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creating theories that explain empirical data. Use the hypotheses to guide feature selection in the process of data collection.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Collect data
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Gathering and harvesting structured and unstructured data from disparate sources. Clean and pre-process data. Remove duplicates. Convert to a uniform format to make records comparable.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Prepare data
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creation and validation of data in order to initiate the process of analysis.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Analyze data
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Conducting data analysis. Choose statistical algorithms that best reveal patterns and trends in the data. Compare with hypotheses and time series forecasts. Determine error rates and significant outliers.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Create data models
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Creation of conceptual and physical data models as an outline for data structure and storage.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Review data models with stakeholders
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Confirm data models represent the hypothesis supporting the original research question

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Refine data models
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Make required changes to data model based upon review with stakeholders.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Report on analysis
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Summarizing and documenting the results of data analysis. Create graphs and visualizations to illustrate numerical findings to make them more accessible to readers.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Identify remedial actions
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Determining the steps that need to be taken to correct the shortcomings.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage environmental health and safety (EHS)
sub_work_functions.description: Determining the impacts of environmental health and safety. Create and implement the EHS program. Train and educate employees of the EHS function. Oversee and manage the EHS program.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Determine environmental health and safety impacts
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Determining the impact of EHS offering--and the procedures it employs to process them--on the environment at large, as well as the health and safety of employees. Evaluate the environmental impact of the organization's products, services, and operations. Conduct health, safety, and environmental audits.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Develop EHS program
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Identify the requirements for regulation and shareholders. Assess future risks and opportunities. Develop a policy for the EHS program. Record and manage EHS program events.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Monitor and manage EHS program
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Managing the performance, costs and benefits of EHS. Measure and report the performance of EHS. Implement plans for emergency response and pollution prevention. Train and educate employees. Provide EHS support.

sub_work_functions.name: Manage sustainability
sub_work_functions.description: Developing and managing sustainability practices for the organization. Ensure proper understanding and communication of ESG standards, requirements, capabilities, and future trends. Promote awareness, alignment, and continuity.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Develop sustainability capability
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Developing sustainability (ESG) capabilities for the organization. Understand and communicate legal, regulatory, and social/environmental requirements. Establish policies, objectives, guidelines and approaches for ESG efforts and reporting.

sub_sub_work_functions.name: Manage sustainability capability
sub_sub_work_functions.description: Managing sustainability across the organization. Provide training, support, reporting, and oversight to the distributed sustainability efforts across functional units and support services.
